1.1.1:
added changelog message displayed on first
launch of new update or [b]upon clicking on version number[/b]
added support for reusable warps, fireswords and other powerups
fixed max number of treasure showing in level summary
fixed powerups default time and time when added by cheat codes
fixed PunkRat cannons shooting after their death
fixed TowerCannons shooting when out of player's reach
